entry.title: F2Pool has enabled full replace-by-fee
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Adrian Macneil and Chun Wang on June 19, 2015, Adrian expressed concern about the potential consequences of mining pools running an unsafe RBF (Replace By Fee) patch. He mentioned that their system relies heavily on zeroconf transactions for merchant processing and they might need to look into preventing fraud if mining pools started using the patch. In response, Chun Wang provided a link to https://www.f2pool.com/api/mempool which could be useful for Adrian. The content of the email did not provide further details or context.
